story.text: Our most natural answer to where we may find these foundations is to build on [[peer review]]. However we need to take the principles of peer review seriously.

Historically, peer review preceeds science. It was taken (and adapted slightly), by [[Robert Boyle]] and others from the concept of witness evidence in the [[legal system]]. It therefore is not tied to a specific economic model. It is surely independent from the print-based publishing industry. We have moved on. Given modern communications technology we can both expect and demand to improve on such medieval structures.
